plays.text: Penalty to Claude Lemieux 2 minutes for Interference Marc Savard
Penalty to Paul Mara 2 minutes for Crosschecking Scott Nichol

Penalty to Craig Berube 2 minutes for Roughing Brad May

Penalty to Paul Mara 2 minutes for Holding Rob Niedermayer
Penalty to Danny Markov 2 minutes for Holding Craig Conroy
Penalty to Derek Morris 2 minutes for Head Butting Teppo Numminen
Goal scored by Daniel Briere assisted by Todd Warriner and Ossi Vaananen
Penalty to Robyn Regehr 2 minutes for Interference Michal Handzus

Penalty to Michal Handzus 2 minutes for Hooking Craig Conroy
Penalty to Krystofer Kolanos 2 minutes for Holding Rob Niedermayer
Penalty to Daymond Langkow 2 minutes for Slashing Steve Begin
Penalty to Scott Nichol 2 minutes for Roughing Tyler Bouck
Penalty to Tyler Bouck 2 minutes for Roughing Scott Nichol
Penalty to Rob Niedermayer 2 minutes for Tripping Michal Handzus
